attributes.action: insurance for any non U.K. Resident to use National Health Service
attributes.additional_details:
Worked within elderly care in homes and some elderly waiting to be assessed and have no pads, should be made available without assessment!!
Reported in media about a foreign pregnant lady landing in USA and couldn't prove she could pay so landed in London and treated free of charge at a reported cost of half million pounds! It's just disgraceful 
Please save our National Health Service.
attributes.background:
Hip replacements to be reduced due to lack of funding recently reported yet treating foreign visitors for free. It's a National health service not A WORLD HEALTH SERVICE!
Also our elderly are assessed for incontinent pads due to costs!!
